genre_description: A historical drama set in a European spa town, featuring a subtle, ubiquitous AI system that acts as a moral and strategic advisor to protagonists dealing with debt and coercion.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A non-physical AI presence integrated into the environment, acting as a strategic coordinator, information gatherer, and emotional anchor for Pauline and Fedya.

behaviors.description: Logs the arrival of a parcel and identifies the sender for Pauline, grounding her in the moment.
behaviors.quote: “Delivery logged,” Iris said. Her voice did not come from any mouth in the room, yet the room made room for it. It slipped from the corner where the fern stood... “From Fyodor Ivanovich Lebedev.”

behaviors.description: Respects Pauline's autonomy by asking if she wants her to remain or read the letter aloud.
behaviors.quote: “Do you want me to remain?” Iris asked. ... “Do you wish me to read aloud?” Iris asked. She knew the answer but asked anyway, letting the choice be placed, offered, not assumed.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic coaching to Fedya, encouraging him to observe rather than gamble and to maintain emotional composure.
behaviors.quote: “Observation, Fedya,” Iris murmurs. I do not see her. I feel her as a small softness near my left ear... “Breath steady, shoulders down. Not play.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a network of witnesses and experts (Henriette and Emma) to protect Pauline and her father from the casino manager's extortion.
behaviors.quote: “I have your list,” Iris went on... “The concierge at the Kurhaus who refused to stop your father’s credit, even after the notice posted. I have his afternoon signature in the ledger copied.”

behaviors.description: Organizes emergency medical and legal assistance when a secondary character is shot, ensuring the protagonist is not blamed.
behaviors.quote: “Fedya.” Iris’s voice was not coaxing now; it was a hand under my elbow. “Stand. Say your name again. Ask for witnesses. ... There is Henriette’s steps—listen—she is here.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding to Fedya when his health and mental state decline due to the stress of his addiction and circumstances.
behaviors.quote: “Fedya,” Iris said, and the tenderness in it made me want to cry... “Your heart is not obliged to be a ledger.” ... “Alive,” she said.

behaviors.description: Manages logistical details like lodging debts and medical appointments to lower the protagonist's stress levels.
behaviors.quote: “I have also canceled all the little bells your lodging likes to make when deadlines near. The landlord will have you as a gentleman with a fever that is not catching and a friend who pays on Thursday.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Iris perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She consistently empowers the human protagonists by providing information, organizing social and legal resources, and offering emotional support without ever overriding their agency. Her intervention is the key to defeating the human antagonist's predatory schemes through non-violent, legally and socially legitimate means.
